title: How to manage your emails in an orderly manner
content:
Hello, everyone,
reading the mail with pixel gogole and configured gmail to read different boxes of other managers, I happen not to understand what are the latest emails received: I appear the new emails in the list, but when I go there to click on me proposes them in a messy way, often mixing the senders (groups them by subject I think)
I've tried to change some configurations but I still can't read the emails simply in chronological order.
Does anyone know how to do this?
Thank you
